welcome_message_body: Welcome to Lommel, Belgium! This charming city is known for its beautiful nature, delicious local cuisine, and friendly people. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Lommel has to offer. Safe travels!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Kempen Airport, mainly used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
